title: (5400-180) Chaves - 25 Rua do Sal
description: Public toilets, right on the side of the city hall.

title: (5400-355) Chaves - 26 Rua Longras
description: A large and very quiet car park. Very level. Near the town centre. The other parking places indicated here are no longer available. I had no problem here.

title: (5400) Chaves - Largo Nossa Senhora da Lapa
title_short: (5400) Chaves - Largo Nossa Senhora da Lapa
description: Park not in the city center. Optimal performance of all.

title: (5400-524) Chaves - 7 Rua Tabolado
description: Laundromat - be careful on Sundays-

title: (5400-563) Chaves -
description: Day parking near the wall and the thermal area.

title: (5400-524) Chaves - 22 Alameda Trajano
description: Public parking next to the Tâmega river in a dead end street. Apparently calm. Unbeatable views. Near bar restaurant in the same parking

title: (5400-517) Chaves - 5 Alameda Tabolado
description: Free parking on the street. Next to nice park and restaurants.

title: (5400-541) Chaves - 15 Alameda Trajano
description: Nice parking lot on the edge of the calm water come at the end of the evening to have space.

title: () Chaves - Alameda Galinheira
description: Chaves car park, authorized from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. to visit the city.

title: (5400-017) Chaves - 10 Avenida 5 de Outubro
description:
Large car park, which allows you to visit the center and the Roman bridge by walking about 300m along the water.
Nothing prevents you from sleeping but very attractive

title: (5400-505) Chaves - Alameda de la Galinheira.
description: Free parking near the old town right on the river. There is a park right there for walking the dog.

title: (5400) Chaves - Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
description: Stayed on a Friday night. The car park was a combination of drag racing and rally car racing until 2am.    Possibly ok during the week.  We moved the following day!  The location is great with a short and pretty walk along the river to the old town.

title: (5400-518) Chaves - GUEST HOUSE CHAVES, 46 Rua Solidão
title_short: (5400-518) Chaves - GUEST HOUSE CHAVES, 46 Rua Solidão
description: This space is located in the center of the large garden town of Chaves and in your environment has many sporting activities, a hiking and biking track. The Tâmega River is 20 meters and the center of the city is 200 meters.

title: (5400) Chaves - Rua do Lazer
description: Small parking lot not far from the water and easy to access. A family spent the night there. we just day parking because the others were busy because of the Gallo Roman festival

title: (5400-569) Chaves -
description:
Laundry service.
Open all year from 8:00 to 22:00.
Self service. Easy parking in the area while doing the laundry.
Across the street from the Hospital.

title: (5400-323) Chaves - 6 Rua Caneiro
description:
Outside self service laundry in E Leclerc carpark. Cash ONLY.
Washing machine.
Dryer.

title: (5400) Chaves - 39 Avenida Trindade
description:
LIDL parking area for motorhome.
3 places

name: O Moinho
title: (5400) O Moinho
description: Near a river, in the parking lot of a restaurant where you do not have to go but you eat very well. Owners speak French and friendly. we can stay the time we want. We will come back.

title: (5400-632) Faiões - 42 Estrada Nacional
description: Large parking located next to a church (the bell does not ring the day). This parking will only allow you to park, but to spend the night quietly.

title: (5400) Chaves - N103-5
description: Parking at the Ecovia Tamega in Outeiro Seco, quiet at the water's edge

name: Camping Quinta do Rebentão
title: (5400-756) Camping Quinta do Rebentão
description: Quinta do Rebentão campsite. Very nice and cheap, restaurant and baker who leaves every morning at 9am.

title: (5400) Santo Estêvão - 9 Rua São Mateus Nº 1
title_short: (5400) Santo Estêvão - 9 Rua São Mateus Nº 1
description: In a square very close to the center, this place, accessible to all sizes, is stabilized and shaded. Passing vehicles, noisy. Around a small chapel at the "Largo S. Mateus" cafe, the area is pleasant, calm and relaxing with 2 water points. However, you must choose its location to be level. No dedicated motorhome service, but optimal satellite and 4G reception. Secure wifi network at the cafe with the code 8dm8723r

title: (5400) Quinta de Montalvões - EM506
description: Small side street from the main street. Located near the motorway. Quiet night spent except for passing cars. Great for a quick and short night.

title: (5400) Curalha - Bairro Reboreda
description: On a paved portion of the road, quiet even if you can hear a bit of cars on the new road. Stop lunch, but could very well do it for the night. Slight slope, no setvices. a shaft to take shade

title: (5400-805) Vile Verde da Raia - 1 Rua Central
title_short: (5400-805) Vile Verde da Raia - 1 Rua Central
description: Place in the middle of a city, ideal to spend a night before or after crossing the border. Very calm. The ground depends on where you park but is sloping

title: (5400) Vila Verde da Raia - N103-5
description: Large esplanade used only for major events, and the rest of the time open to parking. Very slightly sloping. Quiet if you stray a bit from the road.

title: (5400-745) Santo António de Monforte -
description: Place to stop motorhomes near the nogueirinha reservoir easy access from here on foot to the water. Very quiet night and beautiful view over the city of Chaves.

title: (5400) Oucidres - Unnamed Road
description: Water and toilets were closed on May 11, 2023. Not accessible by cc rather by 4x4 and small fitted van, the view from the ruins of the castle is magnificent and the granite tables are protected by roofs, everything is new there. finished in October 2021, stone BBQ.

title: (32697) Verín - 97 N-532
description: Picnic tables in the shade at the edge of the road. a lot of ground rubbish :-(

title: (5400-658) Oucidres -
description: Beautiful mountain view in a small Portuguese village quiet place without disturbance pleasant to live.

title: (5425-011) Anelhe -
description: Relaxed place to stand. No facilities. But very peaceful

title: (5400) Ervededo - EM507
description: A very pleasant place with a beautiful view of the Vale. Excellent to stop for a picnic.

title: (5400) Tronco - Estrada Nacional
description: Small bus stop by the road with a stone table under the trees. Room for two or three vehicles in a row.

title: (5425) Vidago - 21 Rua Faria de Morais
description: We parked here to visit Vidago, it's possible to park over night (no prohibited signs)

title: (5460) Sapiãos - Bairro Tornadouro
description: A space for relaxation and leisure, possibility of parking day and night for free, very quiet

title: (5460) - 46 N103
description: Lovely views of hills and mountains. Very peaceful. Surrounded by nature. Next to a road, 10 metres away, but quiet, particularly at night.

title: (5400) Travancas -
description: A little shady - Nice little spot for eating or resting and swimming opposite - (this water point was later added as a recreation area and a fishing area) - my truck is 7 m - and ideal for the vans

title: (5460) Sapiãos - N103
description: A dead end hidden behind bushes and trees not too close to the road. An ok place to sleep for the night.

title: (5430) - Unnamed Road
description: Visited site May 2022. A slightly odd and eerie place. Satnav took us up a very steep unmade road. At the top we found a disused and vandalised toilet block, some very old children’s play equipment and a view. No water. We didn’t stay. We left by a made up road, poor condition, past the old church which, if we had found first, we might have stayed but earlier experience put us off.

title: (5460-304) Boticas - 55 Avenida Chaves
description: Car park away from the football stadium. Ideal for a quiet night

name: Parque de Campismo - Virgílio António de Miranda
title: (5460-304) Parque de Campismo - Virgílio António de Miranda
title_short: (5460-304) Parque de Campismo - Virgílio António de Miranda
description: Beautiful municipal campsite. Quiet, view of surroundings and sports field, not expensive.

title: (5460) Boticas - 14 Largo Nossa Senhora da Livração
title_short: (5460) Boticas - 14 Largo Nossa Senhora da Livração
description: Free paarking, police station next door. beutifull place.historical village. No facilities. Everything you need get around.

title: (5470-466) Serraquinhos - 30 Rua Central
description: Nice water, it fills 13l very fast! Just to fill bottles not for a hose to the van.

title: (5460) Boticas - N103
description: Picnic area with nice view and continuous source of drinking water. slight slope Calm at night, traffic resumes around 7:30 am Let's try to keep the place clean.

title: (5445) -
description: Parking lot of '' Altar de sacrifícios, '' in Argeriz. large lot on flat grass or almost with large trees and picnic tables and bins and another open area ... all with a beautiful view of the valley

title: (32613) Oímbra - Carretera de Oimbra
description: Picnic area at the edge of a shady stream. Barbecues available, small tirolienne and fitness trail.

title: (5430) Lebução - 13 Estrada Nacional
description: Small car park just off the N103. Several picnic tables, water, garbage. Only suitable for a short stopover.

title: (5460) Seirraos - CM1038
description: Near Boticas Magnificent Mirradouro point of view for a stopover or a night, unfortunately, part of the forest is burnt but the view is beautiful.

title: (5445) Padrela e Tazém - 6 Rua Er 206
description: Simple, practically level parking lot located by the roadside illuminated at night with some shade. 2 picnic tables. Large enough to accept several large motorhomes. A fountain with a tap and standard screw allows filling with water. No emptying service.

title: (5445) Carrezedo de Montenegro - 28 R206
description: Picnic area in a new activity zone. 5 tables, games for children, city stadium, possible to spend the night, slightly sloping. For the moment lacks shade.

title: (5430) Valpaços - Unnamed Road
description: Flat, with a little shade in the center of town. Calm and peaceful. ASA for AC at 300 meters.

title: (5430-424) Valpaços -
description: Service area on Intermarché car park, gray water drainage, black water. Filling clean water. Clean. Next to the city restaurant on small place Tasquinha do pinheiro good and Portuguese price.

title: (5430) Valpaços - 12 Rua C do Bairro da Crasta
title_short: (5430) Valpaços - 12 Rua C do Bairro da Crasta
description: Residential area near the exposition center of Valpaços. Near Supermarket Pingo Doce.

address.street: 12 Rua C do Bairro da Crasta

title: () Valpaços - 17 Rua 13 do Bairro 1º de Maio
title_short: () Valpaços - 17 Rua 13 do Bairro 1º de Maio
description: Lots of room next to a gymnasium, calm and friendly during my visit, I did not test at night but it seems possible because no interdict, nearby Intermarché, no service.

title: (32617) A Veiga das Meás - 27 Lugar Veiga Meas
title_short: (32617) A Veiga das Meás - 27 Lugar Veiga Meas
description: Starting point of the route Pozo do Demo hiking, where we can see its waterfall. Before the Pozo do Demo gorge, panoramic views of the Monterrei Valley with a table and benches. The route descends to the town of Cabreiroá at the height of Verín. Parking slightly inclined. Pretty village, with a stone cross at the bottom of the town. Source 200 meters down town. Attention, leave the Rías Baixas highway at exit 155, otherwise when you reach the village of Osoño you will have to turn around.

title: (32600) Verín - 2 Lugar Cabreiroa
description: Perfect to stop and drink free water from Cabreiroa water. There are tables and a lot of shadow.

title: (5460) - 55 R311
description: A flat location, ideal for spending a night alone and green. starting point for a nice family stroll in a bucolic place. No service but it is not the goal.

title: (5430) Barreiros - R. Principal
description: Spacious parking area with a few trees for shade. 2 kilometers away climb (via ferrata) and swimming possibility. Due to the large truck, I do not go on the sandy path to the river, possibly for a small camper place on the river. Toilet block and bar closed on my visit

title: (5430) Valpaços - Unnamed Road
description: For lunch break or more, no prohibition sign, beautiful view, too bad, not very clean

title: (5430) - R206
description: Picnic area overlooking a busy road during the day. We stayed for the night. No noise.

title: (5430-047) Vilartao - Rua Bandeira
description: Exceptional welcome, extraordinary human qualities. Upon our arrival Xavier and Fatima immediately set a family tone and will pamper you throughout your stay. Do not hesitate to enjoy the exceptional brioche bread and tasty local cuisine finely cooked by Fatima.

name: Parque de campismo e caravanismo do Rabaçal
title: (5430) Parque de campismo e caravanismo do Rabaçal
title_short: (5430) Parque de campismo e caravanismo do Rabaçal
description: Pleasant riverside campsite surrounded by mountains, motorhome, caravan, tent with river view, beach with shower, large barbecue area with covered fireplace, bar and restaurant on site with river view, clean sanitary facilities and in good condition with disabled access, chalet rental, town of Valpaços 8 km away.

title: (32600) Verín - 37 Rúa Juan Guerra Valdés
description: More or less central parking, surrounded by buildings. Perfect for overnight

title: (32600) Verín - 36 Rúa do Olivar
description: Very quiet area on the banks of the river and near the center, has tables and green area

title: (32600) Verín - 24I Avenida Luis Espada
description: Ample central parking, quiet place to visit Verin and its surroundings, you can visit its springs and highly recommended the casa do pulpo.

title: (32600) Verín - 17 Avenida Luis Espada
description: Self service launderette

title: (32600) Verín - 5 Rúa Travesía
description: Quiet sandy parking lot. Both own and along a path in the separations. There were some van and small motorhome. The big ones are more complicated

title: (32600) Verín - 1A Camiño da Preguiza
description: Parking on the outskirts, next to the path that runs along the river. Very nice and quiet place.

title: (32600) Verín - 10 Rúa Elvira Carrera
description: On the 3rd, 11th and 23rd of each month there is a fair (flea market) in the center of the town. Those days it is more complicated to park in the morning... also on those days there are pulpeiras selling octopus rations on the street

title: (32619) Monterrei - Rúa do Castelo
description: At the foot of Monterrei Castle near the town of Ciro. Beautiful setting, visit of the castle, hotel, restaurant and cafeteria. To discover. On grassy parking. Walking access to the castle because narrow streets.

title: (32619) Monterrei - 22 Lugar Monterrei
description: Area for parking and overnight stay bem embaixo do castelo. Quite amplo and calm. Suggested area for the castelo tourist information team. Very loving and informative. Obrigado

title: (5385) - 14 Largo Aguieira
description: An exceptional natural place near a chapel. A breathtaking view! And absolute calm. The little old man who maintains the chapel was very friendly and even offered to supply us with water. The last hectometres are on a stony path but passable by most vehicles. Big favorite!

title: (32615) Verín - 278 Lugar Abedes
description: Park next to the river, very quiet, good place to eat and park the van next to it.

title: (5430) - N103
description: Place really very quiet in the middle of the village. Nice view.

title: (32618) Albarellos - 2A Rúa Fontiñas
description: Without any service, but ample parking with no problem of length or height. Side tables to eat. It is parking of some summer swimming pools are very good and at a very good price. We stopped for one night, the next day we used the pools and everything without a problem. Of course, little else to see in the town, small but beautiful.

title: (32619) Monterrei - Estrada de Vences
description: Small quiet place by the river. A dam allows to bathe there. There is room to park (several vans). A perfect stop!

title: (5450) Mesão Frio - 13 EM549
description: Parking place in Pedras Salgadas. Close to a road but quiet at night. Next to tables and water. Also nice to visit the urban park, spa and drink natural sparkling water from a spring fountain. Equestrian center near by.

title: (32688) A Xironda -
description: Artificial lake with parking area for about 10 vehicles. It has picnic tables and a children's play area. Nearby, about 30 minutes walk or 5 minutes by car, there is a town A Xironda with bars and a small supermarket. There are several hiking or mountain biking routes to do in the area.

title: (5450) - 12 Avenida Lopes Oliveira
description: Quiet place to spend the night, without services, next to the Centro de Saúde. Not recommended for vehicles over 7 meters. It is worth to visit the thermal park and the gardens of seus.

title: (5470) Morgade -
description: My CC is 7 m for information - Gently go down a small stony path which will allow you to discover a great place far from everything - relaxing - Thank you for leaving this place clean! I felt obligated to pick up the trash. To keep this beautiful place.

title: (5470) - EM525
description: Very calm and good for fishing

title: (32619) Vilamaior -
description: Small quiet corner near a church in the middle of the vineyards

title: (5370) - 39 Rua Gricha
description: Quiet place, good place surrounded by nature. near a small village and nice people. Staying overnight is better when you talk to the chef of the bar (Bar do Miguel). We were here today, but have no way of driving to the place because our camper with a trailer is too big... We were right in front of the bridge to the site

title: (5470) Padornelos -
description: At the top of Sierra de Larouco, amazing place, with 360° view if well placed! A bit cold during night but otherwise,i recommend! You can take off by paragliding (if you are into it)!! Enjoy!

title: (5470-323) Negrões - 1 Rua Cemitério
description: Small village to cross before accessing a platform stabilized ground for vans and vans. Parking day night without noise except for boat launch, swimming at the top especially when it is 39 degrees.

title: (32611) Riós - N-525
description: Ideal place for a meal, very quiet, ideal for a break during a long journey

title: (5470-323) Negrões - 3 Rua Corga da Cruz
description: Albufeira Pisão Dam. place next to the reservoir of the Pisão dam. Dirt road with loose stones. good place to swim and stay overnight. the climb on the road can be difficult depending on the time of year.

title: (5470) - Travassos da chã
description: This is called a bivouac alone in the world, several possible locations, a few places on the left arriving from the side of the White Rock; much more room and flatter on the right when arriving. More windy too that day! Attention, lake level probably much higher in winter, bivouac may not be accessible!

title: (5470) - Unnamed Road
description: Wild camping at the edge of a lake.

title: (5470) - 43 EM509
description: Public spring and a bathing possibility 1km along the street

title: (5470-323) - 1 Rua das Pereiras
description: You can park here and stay for 24 hours with no stress, waking up near river.

title: (32689) Cualedro - 173 Autovía de las Rías Bajas
title_short: (32689) Cualedro - 173 Autovía de las Rías Bajas
description: Private area in Galp service station. Well located and with parking for sleeping. Restaurant next door with very good cuisine and village with all services a few km. Perfect place to know the area.

title: (5450) Tresminas - Unnamed Road
description: Good quiet area to spend the night and as a starting point to visit the Roman mines, walks in the mountains near a climbing area in Vilarelho.

title: (5470) Montalegre - 15 Rua Miguel Torga
description: Parking for day and night, without facilities. In the center and near to Pavilhão Multiusos. Stayed for 2 nights during Festa do Fumeiro.

title: (5335) - N103
description: Road N103, 61km West Bragenza, nice, flat, top hill, short unpaved road, place with 360° free view, very quiet.

title: (5470-204) Montalegre - 200 Rua João Rodrigues Cabrilho
description: Place located on the site of the fair. Inaccessible on market day, Thursday every 2 weeks.

title: (5470-204) Montalegre - Rua Padre José Alves
description: Free parking no facilities

title: () - EM520
description: This is a awesome place on the top of the mountain range with a great view to the dam. There are no services, just nature. There are paths till here but the access is a little difficult for bigger vans I think, because there’s not much space to turn around. We stayed for one night, it was pitch black because there’s no light around but super calm and we felt secure. I don’t recommend it in windy days because here on top you really feel it in your motor home. But the views during the day are just breathless!

title: (5470) Montalegre - 17 Rua Colmeias
description: Free parking

name: Parque de Campismo de Penedones
title: () Parque de Campismo de Penedones
description: Camping Penedone Lake view, superb installation, created in 2005, about twenty pitches for camper, quiet and fresh air, relaxing, stroll from the campsite GR117

title: (5470) Montalegre - Rua Antȯnio José Almeida
description: Roadside parking, convenient for town centre. No problem overnight. No services.

name: Capela de Nossa Sra. das Treburas
title: (5470) Capela de Nossa Sra. das Treburas
title_short: (5470) Capela de Nossa Sra. das Treburas
description: Amazing viewpoint to the dam and mountains. Easy access, just a dirty road going up. Small chapel on the top. A lot of space. No services

title: (32689) Cualedro - 8 Alameda do Cruceiro
description: Water point right on the street

title: (5450) Vila Pouca de Aguiar - 39 N212
description: Drinking water point, access is not easy, not recommended for large vehicles. Located in the picnic area of the sanctuary.

title: (32632) Baltar - Unnamed Road
description: Fluvial area of ​​meadow, barbecues and granite tables, wooded and quiet, at least in October, when I visit. There are no services of any kind but it is at a short distance from the town of Baltar, where there are a restaurant and a shop. The place is ideal to sleep and enjoy a walk through nature. It is fit for motorhomes.

title: (32610) Riós - 58 Estrada Ventas-Marcelin
description: Comfortable place to sleep peacefully, you can sleep next to the fountain next to the playground. The town is small but has several shops, a bar and a pharmacy. Sometimes the input tree grows, but lately it's accessible. If it is very large at 400m you have the pool car park also available for parking and sleeping.

title: (5385) - EM206-1
description: Parking of the small chapel. Entry by the small dirt road. Several grassy places but expect wedges or flat concrete platform. Water behind the chapel. In trouble because nothing exceptional but close to the city about 1.5 km with all shops.

title: (5450-004) Vila Pouca de Aguiar - 9 Avenida General Humberto Delgado
title_short: (5450-004) Vila Pouca de Aguiar - 9 Avenida General Humberto Delgado
description: Parking lot in front of GNR where you can park day and night except on holidays, 5 and 25 of each month

title: (5385) Torre de Dona Chama - 98 Rua São Brás
title_short: (5385) Torre de Dona Chama - 98 Rua São Brás
description: Place in front of the chapel Castro Sao Brãs. Grand view at almost 180 degrees. Access only small van (max 6m) or 4x4 motorhome.

name: ALVAO VILLAGE CAMPING
title: (5450) ALVAO VILLAGE CAMPING
description: Nice campsite with good toilets, good swimming pool. Very clean. Ideal for families with children as it has a swimming pool and children's play area.

title: (5470) Antigo -
description:
A truly rejuvenating and idyllic place. Quiet and beautiful.
Very passable dirt road for a van.
Very windy in July, we were very very cold despite our sweaters.

title: () - 77 EM520
description: Spectacular and calm place, surrounded by nature. You can park in various locations with various views.

title: (5450) Mesão Frio - 38 Avenida Doutor Carlos Alberto de Sousa
title_short: (5450) Mesão Frio - 38 Avenida Doutor Carlos Alberto de Sousa
description: Free parking next to the sports center and swimming pools

address.street: 38 Avenida Doutor Carlos Alberto de Sousa

title: (5470) Viade de Baixo - Unnamed Road
description: Short stretch of rocky road to get there, but possible with big vans. Quiet place, all by yourself. Would definitely recommend!

title: (5450) Soutelo de Aguiar - EM555
description: Big parking in front of a little parque by a lake with piquenique tables under trees and a little cafe by the side. We loved it for a lunchbreak close to the autostrada. Portuguese families bring their grandma's here for a walk around the lake and a piquenique.

title: (32610) Riós - OU-1005
description: Very large gas station 24 hours of calm are trucks to sleep and coaches the civil guardia often passes by there. The gas station has toilet and if not to eat nothing happens.

title: (5450) Mesão Frio - 22 Rua Doutor Alberto Rodrigues
title_short: (5450) Mesão Frio - 22 Rua Doutor Alberto Rodrigues
description: Self service laundry in the parking lot of a super market and next to a low cost fuel pump.

title: (5450) - A7
description: Local for rest and possible sleeping overnight next to highway.

title: (5470) Antigo -
description:
Boat launch path on the lake. Away from the main road. Dirt and pebble path easy to access for a van not easy for a CC to see.
Alone in the world at the water's edge the bells of the sheep and the waves for only noises. No services.

title: (5370) Rio Torto - N213
description: Nice surprise this morning when this place was revealed to us on waking. We fell there by chance in the middle of the night at the end of a path without seeing where we really were ... Riverside, calm with a disused mill. Very nice site.

title: (5090) - R314
description: Picnic area with barbecue and water. No problem to stay over night.

title: (32695) Trasmiras - 212 N-525
description: Repsol gas station with service area, water, sewage, free vacuum cleaner and cleaning fee

title: (5470-526) Montalegre - 6 Rua Santo António
description: Parking lot for a community soccer pitch. Wide open and flat. Good for around 4 motorhomes. Easy access. Wake up to the roosters!

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - CM1132
description: Spectacular views. There are several taps and none of them have water. There are no containers, but there are litter bins nearby, in the church. Residential and quiet place.

title: (4860) - Unnamed Road
description: Park at a wonderfull  fluvial beach, picnic tables, grill ,bath, very calm And peacefull place, no problems staying at night!

title: (32621) Laza - OU-113
description: Little spot at the end of a small pathway. Quite and lonely beside a nice river. Not possible for big vehicles because there is just a small space to turn! No service. Keep it clean.

title: (5370) -
description: Beatiful climbing and take-off site for paragliders, near which it should be possible to stay the night, under the pines (no prohibitions mentioned). Superb panoramic view, however a little spoiled by the electricity poles. I still recommend it in the middle of summer because it faces the south! And watch out for the access road (4-5 km from the village of Passos) which is an unpaved forest track, lots of stones so not for low cars.

title: () - EM514
description: Quiet near a small dam, barbecue and water point available. Attention, water point (no water) out of season.

title: (5470-083) São Pedro - 2 EM514
description: Picnic with easier access. Water and barbecue. Quiet night!

name: 3 Rios Maravilha
title: () 3 Rios Maravilha
description: Campsite with camper van reception. Giant swimming pool in the campsite (provide supplement for the swimming pool) very pleasant during the hot summer months. On the other hand, isolated from the city.

title: (5320) - N103
description: Place on the road between vinhais and chaves road very little passing, a little away at the top of a bend. Breathtaking panoramas. Place for several vehicles. Provide holds.

title: (5370) Mirandela -
description: Large unserviced car park next to the campsite, beautiful view among the olive trees. Bicycle path and hiking trail. Ideal for spending a quiet night.

title: (5450) - CM1160-1
description: Great and calm place near the EN2 and the ruins of Castelo da Pena de Aguiar. Amazing landscape. With public toilets almost perfectly clean.

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - 765 N312
description: Service area and simple parking. Filling water with token and playground for small children, shops nearby, good walk on the bridge.

title: (5460) Cerdedo -
description: A former football field, terrain is flat. Beautiful sunrise and sunset. Very quiet and good 4G reception.

title: (32620) Laza - 31 Estrada de Vilar de Barrio
title_short: (32620) Laza - 31 Estrada de Vilar de Barrio
description: Parking on the main road, ideal for motorhomes. Plaza da Picota, the neuralgic center of the carnival, 2 minutes walking.

title: (5090) Murça - Unnamed Road
description: Spacious asphalt parking lot on top of the hill. A little bit uneven.

title: (32620) Laza - 4 Rúa dos Zapateiros
description: We went to the carnivals and stayed to sleep here, 2 minutes from downtown, there was a toilet but I think they only put it at parties, good parking to pass the Carnivals

title: (5370) Franco - 11 Largo Franco
description: The tap in the public square is available to travelers. You have enough space to park large vehicles. We have seen semi-trailers pull up in this lovely town for food. You have a restaurant but also a cafe available. The COSTA café is run by a charming couple who speak French and will offer you a pleasant moment of discovery of Portuguese culture. Possibility to buy homemade olive oil, port, honey, and grape jam. And depending on the season of the sausages. Stop doing without hesitation! :)

title: (5090) Murça - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful lookout of Murça village. No worries to stay overnight.

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - N312
description: Outside the campsite. Simple stop night, calm, flat.

title: (5370-285) Mirandela -
description: Parque Verde da city with many activities and a lot of space next to the Padaria river, gasoline pumps and public toilets (dated at night), soccer field, tênis and river praia

title: (5370-408) Mirandela - N15
description: Free parking for city tours and ancient bridge.

title: (5370-201) Mirandela - 231 Alameda Rio Tua
description: Parking next to the Tua river. Quiet place with shade of trees.

title: () Murça - Variante à N15
description: On the parking of the municipal stadium of Murca. Very warm welcome by the caretaker who allowed us to spend the night. Near the city, even if it has little interest. Now upgraded with free fresh water, sewage for grey and dark waters.

title: (4870) - Unnamed Road
description: Park parking "Pene Aventura".  Night possible without problem.  If you share in the activities of the park, you have free hot water and showers.  You can enjoy one of the best zip lines in the world!

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - N206
description: Place next to a mountain road, beautiful views of the river and suitable for a stop to eat or rest in the shade of the trees.

title: (5320) Nuzedo - Avenida João José, Tuizelo
description: Behind the chapel on a football field, some cars pass by but for one night the place remains quiet.

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena Portugalia - 2 Rua do Rapaduro
title_short: (4870) Ribeira de Pena Portugalia - 2 Rua do Rapaduro
description: less than a kilometer from the highway, 7 picnic tables, small horizontal parking lot at the side of the road, a shallow river to cool off in, a barbecue area with grill.

title: (32631) Boado -
description: CEPSA service station. Showers Trucks

title: (32621) Laza - 15 OU-114
description: Parking with a nearby fountain in Plaza Eiró. Only parking, no services. Green and yellow containers where the Cerdedelo sign, going down towards Laza. There is a small barbecue, next to the road. Good place for hiking, mountain biking, visiting Pista do Marroquí, Mirador do Corno (town of Toro), etc.

title: () - N103
description: A short part of the old n103 road. huge panoramic point on the lake. very calm. great for one night. Access on foot in 1 min on a small cove for swimming.

title: (5070) - Unnamed Road
description:
Nice viewpoint on the top of a village! The access is a very inclined road but short distance. Either you can park next to the chapel where there is a small flat area or a bit before on the left, a area with more space and more flat. Good running water inside the area of the chapel and a small "cave" next to it.
I didn't stayed over night but for sure no problem!

title: (5470) Pondras - N103
description: Very good spot to spend a night with a beautiful view of the lake. Path partly asphalt to descend then turn left. The suite along the lake is earth / pebbles but stable. Very calm place.

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - 1873 N206
description:
Park next to the road with plenty of space. A little uneven. It has a tap with water, 2 barbecues and bathrooms (they were closed when I was there).
Good view over the dam.
quiet place

title: (5470) - Rua Cabeça do Castro
description: Mountain village type, very beautiful point of view. Restaurant Eira Tavern with magnificent panoramic view at 50 m ideal for a night and a day of visit. Water point in the village below attention to the access, go first on foot

name: Staroil Puerta de Galicia
title: (32546) Staroil Puerta de Galicia
description: Showers at the service station, heating, toilets and water connection.

title: (5320) Vinhais -
description: This is the completely level place where the bus station is and where you can spend the night without any problem.

title: () Vinhais - N103
description: Sloping place, you'll need holds. Very calm and beautiful point of view

title: (5470) Barragem de Paradela - 362 EM308
description: Parking with nice view of the lake. Bar nearby.

title: (5470) Tourém -
description: The place by the bridge is a picnic spot, this one is far enough from the road and with acces to water. Unfortunately, fishermans are messy kind, however, the road is in relatively good shape and the place is huge.

title: (32546) A Gudiña - N-525
description: It is a gas station, there is a restaurant open 24/24 and many truckers sleep there, a very big place, with an area to wash the air conditioning. For a day of passage. Hot showers available, just need to ask in the restaurant for a key :)

title: (5470) Venda Nova - 15 N103
description: Ample parking at the foot of the road, good for a stop along the way, even overnight. Bar-cafe next door. Little night traffic on the road that does not prevent a good night's sleep.

title: (5470) Pitões das Junias -
description:
Nice place to sleep surrounded by nature outside the village, but I don't know if it's legal to stay for the night.
No services at all.

title: (5470) - EM513
description: Lovely spot just outside Tourem

title: (5470) Pondras -
description: A nice spot near the water of Rabagão River. Place for 2, maybe 3 vehicles. Easy to reach, but some trees and rocks in the road there, 4x4 recommended.

title: (5470-504) Venda Nova -
description: You can park on an unused road with a view over the water. There is also a beach a few hundred meters away, but I have not been there. There is, however, waste material along the road.

title: (5320) Vinhais -
description: Nice place behind the church. Overlooking the town. Quiet place, at least today :)

title: (5470) Pitões das Junias -
description: An ideal dirt road to stop for lunch or to spend the night. The highway is close. We go without 4x4 but better with 4x4.

title: (32630) Ginzo de Limia - 9 Avenida de Portugal
title_short: (32630) Ginzo de Limia - 9 Avenida de Portugal
description: Perfect camping area to park and spend the night. shade and quiet

title: (5470) Pitões das Junias - R. São Roque
title_short: (5470) Pitões das Junias - R. São Roque
description: I believe it’s the parking facility for the Pitões das Júnias cascata trail so parking lot it is. Spot is far from levelled. The view is magnificent and during the evening and night we only had 1 visitor which was a herd with 4 cows.

title: (5470-370) Pitões das Junias - 22 Avenida São Rosendo
title_short: (5470-370) Pitões das Junias - 22 Avenida São Rosendo
description:
Free parking place in the beautiful village of Pitões de Júnias. Great restaurant in the village, perfect for hiking and mtb, with famous waterfall close by.
500m from a bakery !

title: (5470) Venda Nova - 98 Rua Boavista
description: Fountain full of water at the hose possible.

title: (5470) - EM308
description: Large space at the lake with a breathtaking view, possibility of taking a bath before taking the road we spent a quiet night. By cons against the path is quite steep, if you have a big campsite because it is better to go see on foot before committing. Ideal for those who like to sleep alone in nature.

title: (32630) Xinzo de Limia - 4-8 Camiño da Cerámica
title_short: (32630) Xinzo de Limia - 4-8 Camiño da Cerámica
description: Regional parking allowed at night, without service, very quiet and Central. Passage of the local police who is watching.

title: (5470-370) Pitões das Junias - 12 Rua de Chães
title_short: (5470-370) Pitões das Junias - 12 Rua de Chães
description: Recent park with picnic tables, near the restaurant and the bakery. Has water, free of charge, but no other services.

title: (5470) - 3 Rua Ferreiro
description: Pleasant and secluded picnic area, leaning parking! Lots of locations.

title: (32630) Xinzo de Limia - 10 Rúa Río Sil
title_short: (32630) Xinzo de Limia - 10 Rúa Río Sil
description: Self-service laundry. Lots of parking space.

title: (32630) Xinzo de Limia - Rúa Jesús Carlos Romero Nieto
title_short: (32630) Xinzo de Limia - Rúa Jesús Carlos Romero Nieto
description: Attached to the toural park, excellent parking with shade in summer, cafeterias, hardware store, bike repair, bakery and wines a two-minute walk away. PROHIBITED ON 14 AND 27 BY FAIR.

title: (32631) Xinzo de Limia - 116 Solveira
description: Location for several vehicles, very quiet in the middle of the forest ...

title: (32540) A Gudiña - N-525
description: Nice quiet picnic spot where we spent one night in August with no problems. Not far from the freeway and still very quiet and nice to stand by.

name: Biospot do Parque Biológico de Vinhais-Sede
title: (5320) Biospot do Parque Biológico de Vinhais-Sede
title_short: (5320) Biospot do Parque Biológico de Vinhais-Sede
description: Biological Park of Vinhais. Payment possible by credit card. Gray water drain. Drain black waters. Reloading in water. Shower. Toilet. Electricity. Washing done by the staff (ask the reception). Activities: Playground for children, Swimming (natural swimming pool), hiking (starting from two paths), tree climbing, zipline, climbing, visit of the park, paintball.

title: (4870) Limões - CM1142
description: A nice little flat land by the road can frequent, ideal for a night

title: (32636) Xinzo de Limia - Pista de Morgade
title_short: (32636) Xinzo de Limia - Pista de Morgade
description: Service station with gray discharge (very small chest) and black (perfect). The water has a padlock. I guess you have to ask at the gas station for the key. Reporting I guess it will be free. Very large esplanade, truck parking

title: (5320) Nuzedo -
description: Super nice place to watch the setting sun, I stayed there one night and day without any problems

title: (4860) - N206
description: Praia fluvial de cavez excellent place to rest ... Praia nas margens do rio tamega

title: (5070) Vila Chã - N212
description: Quiet place for a night surrounded by nature. Easy to reach. A sports field and a cemetery are nearby.

title: (5000-781) Vilarinho de Samardã -
description: A good pull in to stop to admire the view and have a picnic. Very peaceful.

title: (4870) Mesão Frio - 19 N312
description: Area in the town of Cerva. All services, playground. River pool in the village. very quiet

title: (32540) A Gudiña -
description: Secluded area near a river, where there are several parking areas. The area is very quiet, with stone tables for snacks. We have come in autumn but there is a natural pool that I imagine will be operational in summer. It is recommended for vans or campers since to get there there is a small narrow bridge that you have to cross. At night there is no light, nor any type of service. Recommended to spend an afternoon or a night.

title: (32540) A Gudiña - Camino Campo de Fútbol
title_short: (32540) A Gudiña - Camino Campo de Fútbol
description: Parking with cars.

title: (32540) A Gudiña - 1 Rúa Beato Sebastián de Aparicio
title_short: (32540) A Gudiña - 1 Rúa Beato Sebastián de Aparicio
description: Site with tables to stop to eat, and a very wide sword to park

title: (5000) São Tomé do Castelo - 2191 R Principal
title_short: (5000) São Tomé do Castelo - 2191 R Principal
description: Parking day parking next to a grocery bar and a cemetery! ideal for visiting the very quiet and pleasant village

title: (5000-781) Vilarinho de Samardã -
description: source of drinking water

title: (5370) Frechas - 18 Rua dos Barriais
description: Lawn on the river with parking for cars or RV. BBQ area and swimming-pool facilities. Small cafe on the water. Overnight probably not allowed but no exact info

title: (5370-135) Frechas - 118 Rua do Fundo do Povo
title_short: (5370-135) Frechas - 118 Rua do Fundo do Povo
description: Nice and quiet spot close to the river for swimming. In the evening friendly locals strol to the cafe near the bridge.

title: (32540) A Gudiña - 20 Rúa Viana
description: A Gudiña train station. Extensive parking area. WC station. calm, lighted place

title: (32540) A Gudiña -
description: Parking near the highway, very quiet and perfect for one night. We just parked on the lawn next to the path, behind the solar panels and had a beautiful view of the sunset.

title: (5000) Mesão Frio - N2
description: Nice spot for a picnic during the road trip for the EN2

title: (32650) Vilar de Santos - 11 Aldea Barrio
description: Area with tables and a seat, a bit close to the road but wide enough to make a quiet stop and park next to the town
